name: thermal-solar-power-lite
title: Thermal Solar Power (Lite)
author: ZarSasha, MarximusMaximus, CyberWizard2261, Caxx
description: Streamlined fork of Thermal Solar Power by MarximusMaximus and others. Contains the basic thermal solar panel (+ large version for better performance), heat exchanger & heat pipe. A new heat loss mechanism has been added, along with various features, visual updates, settings and new mod compat. The mod is carefully balanced for vanilla, but can be configured.
